sentences.en: A lot of cars passed through the turnpike at rush hours.
sentences.cn: 许多车在交通高峰时通过了高速公路.

sentences.en: A lot of motels lie beside the turnpike.
sentences.cn: 很多汽车旅馆都位于付费公路旁边.

sentences.en: There is a heavy traffic on the turnpike.
sentences.cn: 解析:此句的意思是“收费公路上交通繁忙. ”

sentences.en: We drive the turnpike to work.
sentences.cn: 我们开车经过收费公路去上班.

sentences.en: We had to take a circuitous route because of an accident on the turnpike.
sentences.cn: 由于收费公路上发生了事故,我们不得不走一条弯路.

sentences.en: We're on the turnpike. just two miles from downtown.
sentences.cn: 我们就在高速公路上——离市区只有两英里.

sentences.en: You have to pay a toll to drive on a turnpike.
sentences.cn: 在收费公路上开车要缴通行税.

trans.tran_cn: 公路，付费公路，（旧时的）收税关卡
trans.tran_en: a large road for fast traffic that drivers have to pay to use
